natural solution: The graph of $y=\tan \frac{x}{2}$ passes through one full period as $\frac{x}{2}$ ranges from $-\frac{\pi}{2}$ to $\frac{\pi}{2},$ which means $x$ ranges from $-\pi$ to $\pi.$  Thus, the period is $\pi - (-\pi) = \boxed{2 \pi}.$

assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. y x = tan (x / 2)"
